summary: Diff makes broad frontend routing/layout/content changes and replaces backend actor with a Hello World query, but does not provide clear evidence of addressing a specific production deployment failure root cause or ensuring all required routes and simulator behavior remain intact. There is also an apparent route mismatch for Privacy Policy between the router and navigation links.

missing_requirements.requirement: Resolve the production deployment error so the app can be successfully deployed, then perform a fresh production deployment retry. Identify the root cause and apply minimal changes so deployment succeeds without changing existing app behavior.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows extensive UI/page content and routing refactors plus a backend replacement, but it does not show any concrete change directly tied to a diagnosed deployment failure (e.g., canister config/build fixes). Also, a route mismatch suggests existing routes may not render as required.

missing_requirements.requirement: After deployment, the app loads in the browser and the existing routes render (Home, How It Works, Disclaimer, About Us, Contact, Privacy Policy).
missing_requirements.reason: Privacy Policy route is registered as "/privacy-policy" in App.tsx, but SiteLayout navigation links to "/privacy". This likely breaks navigation to the required Privacy Policy route.

hallucinated_features.description: Replaced backend canister logic with a minimal "hello" query returning "Hello, World!"
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest states the app remains frontend-only for simulator logic and asks for minimal changes to fix deployment without changing behavior; swapping backend to Hello World is new behavior and not explicitly requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Major UI/content refresh across multiple pages (new/expanded marketing copy, emojis, themed styling details, contact email addresses).
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals specify not changing existing UI copy beyond what is strictly necessary to fix deployment; these additions appear unrelated to deployment failure remediation.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/expanded TanStack Router route tree setup in App.tsx (createRouter/createRoute/createRootRoute).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request a routing library migration/refactor; only deployment failure fix with minimal behavior change.
